sense.def:
To scribble something
pomeni nekaj hitro in grdo pisati.

seg.quote: She was scribbling a letter to her mother.

sense.def:
To scribble
pomeni tudi s svinčnikom ali peresom narisati nesmiselne črte ali krace.

seg.quote: Someone's scribbled all over the wall.

sense.def:
Scribble
ali
a scribble
je nekaj na hitro in grdo napisanega ali narisanega.

seg.quote: She was looking at my scribble, trying to work out what it said.
There are scribbles on the lift wall.
